description:
As of April, 2025 the Bing Maps API is no longer allowing connections to the tile interface. As a result, this app is broken and cannot be repaired. Try Yandex Maps as an alternative for TouchPads.

Maps are back! Map Lite is a lightweight map client for a retro map service that combines Bing Maps with IPInfo Geolocation, to create a lean, but functional map experience on webOS. Navigate by tapping North, South, East, or West on your screen, zoom in or out, or jump to other continents. IP-based geolocation is approximate, and your location is not shared with Google, Bing or anyone else.
versionNote:
Known issues: navigating around Australia doesn't work, its not possible to navigate across bodies of water -- navigate around, or use the jump feature instead.
1.1.0 - This security update is required in order to load maps. Also adds dark theme, supports move to webosarchive.org domain. If you keep seeing this message, please uninstall the old version manually -- the application ID has changed.
